title: location
damage-may-2016-transect-competition: transect and competition experiments in Jasper Ridge Biological Preserve

title: Plot
damage-may-2016-transect-competition: plot ID (A, C, E in transect experiment, plot number in competition experiment)

title: Species
damage-may-2016-transect-competition: grass species ID (AB = Avena barbata, BH = Bromus hordeaceus, SP = Stipa pulchra, PA = Phalaris aquatica, BD = Bromus diandrus, EG = Elymus glaucus)

title: HostGroup
damage-may-2016-transect-competition: grass species ID (above) and indicator of whether it was planted as a seed or adult
